posts.title: Ultra Slim Laptop Backpack
posts.content: Lug around your gear without creating a cumbersome bulk using this ultra slim laptop backpack. This all black backpack features a padded compartment designed to house up to a 15.6″ laptop in addition to other compartments for a tablet, cables, and documents.

posts.title: Wine Bottle Puzzle
posts.content: The wine bottle puzzle makes the ideal gift for the boozy puzzle enthusiast in your life. This beautifully constructed medium difficulty puzzle consists of 2 wooden pieces and a locking device that prevents the bottle from being opened until the puzzle is solved.

posts.title: Perfect Temperature Coffee Mug
posts.content: Ensure your beverage stays nice and warm up til the very last last drop by serving it inside this perfect temperature coffee mug. This app-assisted mug lets you remotely adjust it to your ideal temperature and sends you a notification when it’s just right.

posts.title: Ship In A Bottle Whiskey Dispenser
posts.content: Bring some class to your quaint home bar with this ship in a bottle whiskey dispenser. It’s expertly hand-blown from durable, thick glass and comes with a ground glass stopper to create a hermetic seal so your spirits never evaporate.

posts.title: Nightmare Before Christmas Cuckoo Clock
posts.content: Commemorate the greatest claymation film of all time by spooking up your home with this Nightmare Before Christmas cuckoo clock. This masterfully handcrafted timepiece depicts Jack Skellington and Sally along with the sinister trio of Lock, Shock, and Barrel.

posts.title: Diffraction Glasses
posts.content: Enhance the effect of your favorite party-time drugs with these diffraction glasses. These one of a kind shades come equipped with specialized lenses that create incredible visual effects, amplifying your concert going experience to the fullest!

posts.title: TASER Pulse Stun Gun
posts.content: Increase your odds of escaping a possibly life-threatening situation by deterring your attacker with the Taser Pulse stun gun. It features a compact handgun style that you can conveniently holster, a long lasting lithium battery, and two live cartridges.

posts.title: Inflatable Fortnite Battle Bus
posts.content: Be the envy of all your neighbors by having the coolest outdoor setup by placing this inflatable Fortnite battle bus in your frontyard. It comes with a built-in pump for maximum convenience and measures eighteen feet long by almost eighteen feet high.

posts.title: Hot Dog Bun Driller
posts.content: Kick your hot dog game up a notch by preparing your plump dogs using this hot dog bun driller. This indispensable utensil features a series of textured edges designed to easily drill a hole into the bun so that you can pour all the condiments without making a mess.

posts.title: 1200 Lumen Rover Mobile Task Light
posts.content: Instantly illuminate the darkest of places using this 1200 lumen rover mobile task light. It features a lightweight ultra portable design, a sturdy steel exoskeleton, four lighting modes, and can pivot almost 180 degrees so that you can easily adjust it.

posts.title: Crua Hybrid Hammock/Tent/Air Mattress
posts.content: Ensure you have a comfy place to sleep no matter what type of environment you encounter in the wild by packing the Crua hybrid hammock/tent/air mattress. It includes a built-in self-inflating air mattress in addition to attached bug mesh to keep out annoying insects.

posts.title: The Ultimate Outdoor/Portable Speaker
posts.content: Give your outdoor excursions a rocking soundtrack by blasting your music from the ultimate outdoor/portable speaker. This rugged waterproof speaker provides superb sound, over 50 hours of rechargeable battery life, and comes with a handy 360 degree light.
